lores.text: The city of the gods, named by the beings that reside there who consider themselves as the rulers of everything that they can see from their lofty perch.

The power of the gods is unknown and has never been tested. They control the rest of the world through the power of their agents who travel outside the city and spread their influence. Even disputes among the gods are never fought directly but through the actions of their agents.
The elemental paths are the first steps for a new god sending their agents into the world.
